home.welcomeParagraph: Hi there! My name is Alexander, and you have found my website. Notice that the website is under maintenance, so don't get your expectations up.
home.someInterests: Here is some of the content you can find on the website:
home.pics: Pictures of me, like that one right above this text.
home.experience: My experiences and achievements within my interests.
home.api: My usage of some API's to show some numbers here and there. Hopefully it works properly.
home.conclusion: You can find everything by searching through the sites!
home.language: Hvis du vil bytte språk til norsk, trykk på flagget oppe i høyre hjørne.

maintenance: Come back later to check out the content of this page. You are welcome to send me a reminder to keep making updates, at alexostgaard@gmail.com.
